data.name: InvalidJdkDirectory_path_locator_message
data.value: An exception occurred while validating the Java SDK installation in '{0}' that was found while searching the paths from '{1}'. Ensure that the Android section of the Visual Studio options has a valid Java SDK directory configured. To use a custom SDK path for a command line build, set the 'JavaSdkDirectory' MSBuild property to the custom path. Exception: {2}
data.comment: {0} - The path of the invalid installation {1} - a "contextual" name for where {0} came from: `Preferred Registry` (Windows Registry), `OpenJDK`, `$JAVA_HOME` (environment variable), etc. {2} - The exception message of the associated exception.

data.name: InvalidMonodroidConfigFile_path_message
data.value: An exception occurred while reading configuration file '{0}'. Exception: {1}
data.comment: {0} - The path of the file being read. {1} - The exception message of the associated exception.

data.name: InvalidXmlLibExecJdk_path_args_message
data.value: An exception occurred while reading the output of '{0} {1}'. Exception: {2}

data.name: XA5300_AndroidSdk_JdkInfo
data.value: An exception occurred while retrieving the properties of the selected Java SDK installation. Check that the selected Java SDK installation contains a compatible version of Java and that 'java -XshowSettings:properties -version' runs successfully for that installation. Exception: {0}
data.comment: The following terms should not be translated: java -XshowSettings:properties -version {0} - The exception message of the associated exception

data.name: XA5300_AndroidSdk_Refresh_Exception
data.value: An exception occurred while finding the Android SDK or Java SDK. Exception: {0}
data.comment: {0} - The exception message of the associated exception

data.name: XA5300_Android_SDK
data.value: The Android SDK directory could not be found. Check that the Android SDK Manager in Visual Studio shows a valid installation. To use a custom SDK path for a command line build, set the 'AndroidSdkDirectory' MSBuild property to the custom path.
data.comment: The following terms should not be translated: AndroidSdkDirectory

data.name: XA5300_Java_SDK
data.value: The Java SDK directory could not be found. Ensure that the Android section of the Visual Studio options has a valid Java SDK directory configured. To use a custom SDK path for a command line build, set the 'JavaSdkDirectory' MSBuild property to the custom path.
data.comment: The following terms should not be translated: JavaSdkDirectory

data.name: XA5300_MonoDroidSdk_Refresh_Exception
data.value: An exception occurred while validating the .NET for Android installation. Using the Visual Studio installer to repair or reinstall the .NET MAUI component might resolve this problem. Exception: {0}
data.comment: {0} - The exception message of the associated exception

data.name: XA5300_MonoDroidSdk_XA_Version
data.value: Unable to determine the .NET for Android version.
